description: Creates a target account configuration for the experiment template. A target account configuration is required when accountTargeting of experimentOptions is set to multi-account. For more information, see experiment options in the Fault Injection Service User Guide.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the target account.

parameters.name: roleArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role for the target account.

nested_items.name: targetAccountConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information about the target account configuration.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role for the target account.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the target account.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the target account.
